mapper.select: select id, username, sex, phonenumber, account, password, idcard, address, img, role, createtime, age, remark,money , petname,petage,petdes,pettype from sysuser where id = #{id}
select id, username, sex, phonenumber, account, password, idcard, address, img, role, createtime, age, remark,money , petname,petage,petdes,pettype from sysuser where account = #{account}
mapper.insert: insert into sysuser(username, sex, phonenumber, account, password, idcard, address, img, role, createtime, age, remark) values (#{username}, #{sex}, #{phonenumber}, #{account}, #{password}, #{idcard}, #{address}, #{img}, #{role}, now(), #{age}, #{remark})

insert into sysuser(username, sex, phonenumber, account, password, idcard, address, img, role, createtime, age, remark) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.phonenumber}, #{entity.account}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.idcard}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.img}, #{entity.role}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.age}, #{entity.remark})

insert into sysuser(username, sex, phonenumber, account, password, idcard, address, img, role, createtime, age, remark) values
(#{entity.username}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.phonenumber}, #{entity.account}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.idcard}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.img}, #{entity.role}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.age}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update username = values(username), sex = values(sex), phonenumber = values(phonenumber), account = values(account), password = values(password), idcard = values(idcard), address = values(address), img = values(img), role = values(role), createtime = values(createtime), age = values(age), remark = values(remark)
mapper.update:
update sysuser
username = #{username},
sex = #{sex},
phonenumber = #{phonenumber},
account = #{account},
password = #{password},
idcard = #{idcard},
address = #{address},
img = #{img},
role = #{role},
createtime = #{createtime},
age = #{age},
remark = #{remark},
money = #{money},
petname = #{petname},
petage = #{petage},
petdes = #{petdes},
pettype = #{pettype},
where id = #{id}
